title: (6022) Python Developer Jr
description:

Operating in 30 countries, ALTEN employs over 54,000 engineers and offers a full development cycle, covering everything from concept design to product development, production systems, and implementation.

title: Python Developer
description:
I'm working with a well-established & innovative company in Stockholm who are harnessing the power of AI to enable a revolutionized video meeting & broadcasting experience!
With a close partnership with Microsoft directly, their product is a fully automated solution that enables anyone to create compelling video streaming & audio content, optimizing & enhancing the capability of Microsoft Teams, LinkedIn live, YouTube broadcasting and beyond, through the use of AI to create professional-grade content, easier than ever before!
Based in Stockholm and across Sweden, they have a talented and established team of engineers, they are looking to expand and bring in another passionate engineer who is keen to build a cutting-edge product!
They have an office in Stockholm and typically have 2 days per week in office, but can be super flexible and for them, the most important thing is that someone is enthusiastic and excited to be part of the journey!
Currently, they are looking for an experienced Python backend engineer to work on the brains of their system, which produces the output stream based on incoming audio/video feeds and configuration!

Additional Skills:Knowledge of software development lifecycle and agile methodologies.Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.Proficiency in Bash scripting for automation and system tasks. 


Preferred Qualifications but not essential! 
Experience with real-time data processing.Familiarity with computer vision libraries and concepts (though not required).Prior experience in video processing or production tools.Strong communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.

title: Data Engineer
description:
About Us
We are Up. We design and deliver digital-first employee benefits that transform the workplace experience. We believe that happy and healthy employees work better and smarter. We help you make this happen while improving productivity and saving money for your business.
Each of our solutions is designed with one simple goal: providing the best customer experience, no matter the solution. This revolves around two core principles: simplicity and fun! Let‚Äôs be honest, the best solution is simple to implement, hassle-free, and (very) fun to use!
Every day, we help tens of thousands of leading companies all over Greece to engage and retain their people. We are constantly learning, fine-tuning the Up experience, and looking towards the future. We have achieved a 96% trust index in Great Place to Work!Up Hellas is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Up Group, present in 34 countries worldwide. www.uphellas.gr www.up-group.coopUp Hellas is quickly nearing 50 employees ‚Äì and we are looking for someone to take us to the next level. If you are full of energy, optimism, and always have innovative ideas ‚Äì click the apply button.
Job Overview:We are seeking a talented and results-driven Data Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate should have 2+ years of experience in data engineering, with a strong understanding of ETL/ELT processes, data pipeline orchestration, and data transformation tools. You will work closely with our engineering and data teams to design, implement, and maintain robust data pipelines that support the needs of the sales, customer support, and product departments. Your work will enable data-driven decision-making across the organization.
Your Main Missions:
Design, develop, and maintain ETL/ELT pipelines to ensure efficient data flow from various sources to our data warehouse.Implement and manage data pipeline orchestration using tools like Apache Airflow.Utilize dbt (Data Build Tool) for data transformation and modeling within our data warehouse environment.Collaborate with the engineering team to integrate new data sources and optimize existing data flows.Ensure data quality, accuracy, and consistency across all datasets.Create and maintain comprehensive documentation of data pipelines, transformations, and processes.Contribute to the continuous improvement of our data architecture and infrastructure.Present complex data engineering concepts in a clear and easy-to-understand manner to technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Your Profile:
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in a relevant field (e.g., Computer Science, Information Systems).Master‚Äôs degree in a relevant field (e.g., Data Engineering, Data Science, Computer Science) will be considered a plus.2+ years of experience in a similar role, ideally within a tech-driven environment.Proficiency in SQL and experience with relational databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, as well as NoSQL databases like MongoDB. Also experience with Clickhouse DB or Apache Druid will be considered a plus.Strong experience with ETL/ELT processes and data pipeline orchestration tools like Apache Airflow.Hands-on experience with Apache Superset or other visualization software.Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure is a plus.Experience with Streamlit for data app development and FastAPI for building high-performance APIs is considered a plus.Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently in a fast-paced environment.Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.
We Offer:
A dynamic work environment with a brand-new office and a great balcony.Lots of benefits: UpEAT, UpGift, UpFit, Private medical plan, breakfast (yes ‚Äì you read that correctly!).A full-time, indefinite contract.Location: Athens‚Äô Headquarters.
All information received will be treated with strict confidentiality

title: Cloud Data Engineer
description:
DATA ENGINEER‚ÄúAls data engineer kreeg ik de kans om aan klantprojecten te werken met Python. Het is mijn taak om deze technologie te gebruiken om klantdoelen te bevorderen, en dat is lonende ervaring‚Äù aldus (C.H. Atgpt)
Het onvermijdelijke introMet dank aan C.H. Atgpt voor de inspirerende woorden. Hoewel: inspirerend? Eigenlijk scratcht de AI slechts aan de surface van wat Datavibes zo aantrekkelijk maakt. Want ja, natuurlijk zetten we tools als Python in om klanten te helpen business ambities te behalen, maar dat zegt niks over de manier waarop (hint: vaak op ingenieuze manieren), met wie (hint: samen met eigenzinnige collega‚Äôs) en hoe (hint: in een setting waar het delen van ervaringen de standaard is). Spreekt dat je aan? Om nogmaals C.H. Atgpt te citeren: ‚ÄúAlle data engineers opgelet! Moe van het dealen met rommelige data en saaie projecten? Word lid van ons team en laat ons jouw data frons ondersteboven zetten! We beloven een eindeloze hoeveelheid koffie en snacks om jouw analytische genie van brandstof te voorzien!‚Äù Volgens ChatGPT was die call to action werkelijk onweerstaanbaar. Dus bij dezen.
Als Data Engineer..Land je thuis. Soms letterlijk, want als jij algoritmen aan de keukentafel wilt opvoeden, mag dat. Maar in ieder geval figuurlijk, omdat het fijn ‚Äòthuiskomen‚Äô is in een community van gelijkgestemden. Waar je precies aan werkt? Denk aan een machine learning model dat zinvol van zinloos nieuws onderscheidt. Of aan een platform dat complexe chemische analyses uit allerlei bronnen combineert en gebruikers in staat stelt om daar trends in te spotten. En meer, want we surfen op een tsunami van spannende opdrachten voor uiteenlopende klanten. Los van het conceptualiseren, bouwen en implementeren van (big) data platformen, met al het query en scripting werk dat je daarmee associeert, pak je vaak een consultancy rol richting de klant. Bijvoorbeeld door hen mee te voeren op data-ontdekkingsreis, samen na te denken over begrijpelijke visualisaties en de data-savviness van afdelingen en collega‚Äôs te stimuleren. Geen rol dus voor mensen die science for science‚Äôs sake willen bedrijven, maar een inkoppertje als je data-inzichten als startschot van impactvolle innovaties beschouwt.
Data-savvy arbeidsvoorwaardeno Een salaris waar vergelijkende algoritmen blij van worden: ‚Ç¨4600 tot ‚Ç¨6800 bruto per maando Goed leasebudget (ook om elektrisch te rijden), of ‚Ç¨700,- mobiliteitsvergoeding.o Snelle laptop, dito smartphone, onkostenvergoeding en pensioenregelingo Volwassen setting ‚Äì family comes first ‚Äì waarbij flexibiliteit is ingebakkeno Lijntjes die zo kort zijn dat je er niet over kunt struikelen (behalve misschien op vrijdagmiddag)o Interessante projecten bij aansprekende opdrachtgevers: alles wat je doet, heeft impacto Data engineering en data science peers die elkaar elke dag sterker willen makeno Veel ontwikkelmogelijkheden: als jij verder wilt, kom je verder. Beloofd.
Wat de data ons influisterto Dat je na afstuderen minimaal 4 jaar fulltime data met ‚Äòvibes‚Äô engineerto Dat je Python, SQL en ETL tot je vaste vriendenclub rekento Dat je Azure, CI/CD en Git ieder geval als goede kennissen beschouwto Dat je een hybride bent: 50% data nerd / 50% consultanto Dat je √≥√≥k goed kunt schakelen met mensen die niet met data ontbijten, lunchen en dinereno Dat je jezelf wilt blijven ontwikkelen √©n de ontwikkeling van collega‚Äôs wilt versnelleno Dat je blij wordt van afwisseling en inhoudelijk complexe uitdagingen
Meer weten? Van een toekomstige collega horen of deze vacature wel op waarheid is gebaseerd? Mail jobs@datavibes.nl Ook als je nog niet alles van ons wensenlijstje afvinkt.

title: Python Developer
description:
Do you like to develop software for different clients and end users? And do you know everything there is to know about Python? If your answers are ‚Äòyes‚Äô, we might have the perfect job for you! We are on the search for an ambitious Full Stack Python Developer who‚Äôs into a new adventure. Are you the person we‚Äôre looking for? Then read on!

Your role 

We build IT solutions for the future, so companies are ready when they need to be. Together with a team of enthusiastic developers, we build networks that (in some cases) have over 100.000 users! As a Full Stack Python Developer you‚Äôll work on the software that‚Äôs going to be used by all these people, how awesome is that?!

You‚Äôll work in a Scrum team. Together with your colleagues you‚Äôre constantly developing and implementing new technology, infrastructure, best practices, new standards and guidelines. You document (software) changes for yourself and your teammates, so you‚Äôre in control about everything that‚Äôs happening. You make sure everything is up to date and improvements are carefully implemented. In addition, you‚Äôll work on daily operational software management. For example; security updates and testing software. You of course pay attention to details and are known for fixing mistakes as fast as possible. In this job, you can expect a lot of freedom and you‚Äôll take on many responsibilities.

Your profile 

You can‚Äôt wait to start working on different developing projects with your brand new colleagues and develop innovative software for different users all over the Netherlands. You are the Full Stack Python Developer who likes to work in a team, takes initiative, and comes up with new solutions and improvements. You are an open, warm and welcoming person who takes pleasure in supporting his or her teammates. Besides that, you have great analytical skills and never miss out on any details. Furthermore you have:

3+ years work experience in software developingexperience with Agile development in Python and JavaScriptexperience with database products like MySQL and PostgreSQLknowledge of Linux (Ubuntu and Red Hat), containers (Docker and Kubernetes) and networksexperience with REST, SOAP, JSON, OAuth2 and other API implementations


Do you also have good (written and spoken) communication skills in Dutch and English? Have you built bigger systems before and do you have a good knowledge about scalability and robustness? That‚Äôs a big plus!

What we offer

Working at our company means working in an enthusiastic and supporting environment. A workplace with attention for every employee and plenty of room to develop yourself. As a Full Stack Python Developer you‚Äôll also get;

Competitive salary 25 holidaysBonus scheme Travel allowance or NS Business CardLearning budget (unlimited!)The possibility to work from home and to furnish your own working place at homeFlexible working hours


About H2B IT Solutions

We are an IT service provider with a beautiful office at the modern business center next to the train station in Haarlem. We build IT infrastructures to support other companies with their future plans. Our solutions perfectly fit with the business models of our clients, and are reliable and high quality. Every colleague has a big passion for IT and likes to share their knowledge with others. We are a small company - which we think has a lot of benefits: it‚Äôs easy to get to know each other, work in a flexible way and invest in the personal development of our employees.

We like our work to be versatile and give everyone the freedom and responsibility to do their job in a way that works best for them. We like to challenge ourselves, so we don‚Äôt follow typical job descriptions: our work tasks will be adapted to certain circumstances and we always have direct contact with our clients. Together we build the greatest networks, virtual platforms and monitoring systems. We also have experience with Linux and Unix, and back up on any software security problems.

&Work will help you

H2B IT Solutions has partnered with &Work. &Work understands that it is important to work in a place where you are valued, where you can develop further and where you are given the space to grow. By applying via &Work, you get direct access to their broad network of employers. &Work can help you with the introduction at H2B IT Solutions, provide background information, prepare you for interviews so that you can present yourself convincingly and assist you during the negotiations to help you take a nice step forward in your career.

title: Backend Developer (100% remoto)
description:
¬øQui√©nes somos?

Nuestra plataforma de Generative AI, f√°cil de usar y con agentes de IA integrados, ayuda a equipos de todos los tama√±os a crear y gestionar contenido, informes de inteligencia empresarial y soluciones de optimizaci√≥n de procesos.
La plataforma SaaS de Narrativa se especializa en la generaci√≥n autom√°tica de contenidos, con un enfoque principal en el sector farmac√©utico y en la creaci√≥n de contenido digital para todo tipo de sectores. Nuestra actividad abarca desde la automatizaci√≥n de procesos relacionados con el lenguaje en sectores como finanzas, marketing, juegos, banca, etc., hasta la producci√≥n de contenidos para medios de comunicaci√≥n y agencias de noticias.
Cubrimos todo el ciclo: desde la obtenci√≥n de datos, su interpretaci√≥n, estudio del dominio, entrenamiento de modelos y distribuci√≥n a nuestros clientes.

Necesitamos incorporar a un backend developer para trabajar en nuestra plataforma SaaS, desarrollando soluciones espec√≠ficas que respondan a necesidades particulares, especialmente en la parte de extracci√≥n, transformaci√≥n y carga de datos.
¬øQu√© perfil buscamos?

Python 3: Flask, FastAPI, Psycopg2, Pandas.Java 17 con Micronaut, Spock, Gradle.PostgreSQL, Clickhouse, Redis.ELK, Gitlab CI/CD, Jenkins, Sonar.AWS/Azure con Docker y K8S.
No nos preocupa en exceso, aunque es recomendable, que domines el lenguaje, base de datos o proveedor de cloud concreto que usamos: se puede ir aprendiendo por el camino. Si controlas m√°s que nosotros pues mucho mejor, as√≠ aprendemos y mejoramos las cosas, pero NO es imprescindible.

Nos importan aspectos m√°s universales como tener nociones de arquitectura, patrones, clean code, clean architecture‚Ä¶ o al menos entender por qu√© se hacen las cosas, haberlas aplicado en la pr√°ctica y haber sufrido la amargura de haber errado. Alguien con criterio y que sepa avanzar sin mucha tutela una vez adaptado a nuestra forma de trabajar, y que nos pueda ayudar a mejorar.
¬øD√≥nde, cu√°ndo y c√≥mo trabajamos?
En Narrativa trabajamos 100% en remoto desde el primer d√≠a. Hay gente trabajando en Madrid, Los √Ångeles, Estonia, Florida‚Ä¶ De vez en cuando, si es posible, coincidimos en presencial para vernos las caras. Usamos Google Chat y Meet, y nos organizamos con Asana. 
En cuanto al horario: el que quieras. Es un puesto a jornada completa, es decir 40h semanales, pero te las distribuyes con sentido com√∫n como t√∫ desees. Simplemente trabajas esas 40h (o rinde como 40h, tampoco tenemos un cron√≥metro). Es interesante que coincidamos el mayor tiempo posible pero es simplemente un deseo.

El sueldo depender√° de la experiencia del candidato, pero estamos pensando en una horquilla entre 40K‚Ç¨ y 45K‚Ç¨.Te damos un presupuesto para elegir port√°til y si lo deseas monitor externo.Seguro m√©dico privado (Adeslas) para ti y tu familia.Seguro de vida.Tarjeta VISA Cobee para beneficios de retribuci√≥n variable.D√≠a LIBRE en tu cumplea√±os.
Y bueno, lo que pone todo el mundo, pero en nuestro caso s√≠ es verdad: formar parte de un proyecto realmente disruptivo que creemos firmemente va a tener un gran impacto en su √°mbito‚Ä¶ Y la realidad as√≠ lo est√° demostrando, pregunta por ah√≠ ;)
----------
Who are we?
Narrativa is a generative AI content automation company. Our Generative AI platform, easy to use and equipped with integrated AI agents, helps teams of all sizes create and manage content, business intelligence reports, and process optimization solutions.
Narrativa‚Äôs SaaS platform specializes in automated content generation, primarily focusing on the pharmaceutical sector and digital content creation for various industries. Our activity ranges from automating language-related processes in finance, marketing, gaming, banking, etc., to producing content for media outlets and news agencies.
We cover the entire cycle: from data acquisition, interpretation, domain study, model training, and distribution to our clients.
What do we want you to do?
We need a backend developer to join our SaaS platform team, developing specific solutions that address particular needs, especially in data extraction, transformation, and loading.
What profile are we looking for?
We are looking for a mid/senior backend developer proficient in some of the following technologies:
Python 3: Flask, FastAPI, Psycopg2, Pandas.Java 17 with Micronaut, Spock, Gradle.PostgreSQL, Clickhouse, Redis.ELK, Gitlab CI/CD, Jenkins, Sonar.AWS/Azure with Docker and K8S.
We are not overly concerned if you don't master every language, database, or cloud provider we use (although it‚Äôs a plus); these can be learned along the way. If you know more than we do, even better‚Äîwe‚Äôll learn from you and improve things together, but it is NOT essential.
We need someone who understands the fundamentals. We care more about universal aspects like architecture, patterns, clean code, clean architecture‚Ä¶ or at least someone who understands why things are done in certain ways, has applied them in practice, and has experienced the frustration of making mistakes. Someone with sound judgment who can progress without much guidance once they‚Äôve adapted to our way of working, and who can help us improve.
Where, when, and how do we work?
At Narrativa, we work 100% remotely from day one. We have people working in Madrid, Los Angeles, Estonia, Florida‚Ä¶ Occasionally, if possible, we meet in person to see each other face-to-face. We use Google Chat and Meet, and organize ourselves with Asana.
Regarding the schedule: it‚Äôs up to you. It‚Äôs a full-time position, meaning 40 hours per week, but you can distribute them with common sense however you like. Simply work those 40 hours (or be productive as if it's 40 hours; we don‚Äôt have a stopwatch). It‚Äôs nice if our working hours align as much as possible, but that‚Äôs a preference. 
What do we offer?
Don‚Äôt forget about the 100% remote work and flexible schedule.
The salary will depend on the candidate's experience, but we are considering a range between ‚Ç¨40K and ‚Ç¨45K.We provide a budget for you to choose a laptop and, if you‚Äôd like, an external monitor.Private health insurance (Adeslas) for you and your family.Life insurance.VISA Cobee card for variable compensation benefits.A FREE day on your birthday.
And well, what everyone else says, but in our case, it's actually true: being part of a truly disruptive project that we firmly believe will have a big impact in its field‚Ä¶ And the reality is proving us right, ask around ;)

title: Software Engineer
description:
Paynovate is where dreams are shaped. Where bold initiatives are taken. Where your leadership, ownership and ability to follow-through are valued. As a growing e-money institution, we are bringing payment solutions to the next level ‚Äì and you could be a part of that.
What we offer:An amazing job in a stimulating, profitable and fast-growing sector. Payment solutions is a complex and constantly evolving field, where innovation is key.A role where your impact will be tangible. We are a company of owners and believe in empowering people to their full potential.A team of talented, motivated and thoughtful individuals, coming together as one to fulfil a common goal ‚Äì delivering smart, simple and innovative solutions to our clients.A dynamic environment full of growth and development opportunities, where your career could take its next major turn. People are our greatest strength, and as an employer, we choose to deliver to you as much you deliver to us.A modern and friendly working environment, where work-life balance is enforced as a structural part of the organization (hello hybrid work!)And of course, a comprehensive and market-competitive salary package: 32 days holiday, mobility budget, company performance-based bonus, meal vouchers, health insurance, guaranteed income insurance, pension and death insurance, phone, homeworking policy and allowance.
Ready for your new challenge?Paynovate is growing. To face the technical challenges posed by our complex sector and business expansion, we are currently looking for a skilled Software Engineer to join our IT team.
Your mission:As Software Engineer, you are responsible for developing the solutions within the scope of the Software Engineering team. You design, develop, and implement software solutions that facilitate financial transactions.For this purpose, you write clean, efficient, and well-documented code in languages like Java, C++, Python, PHP, or similar. Your concise code is easily maintained and managed by other people on the team or even outside the team. You discuss eventual shortcuts or compromises with the Lead Developer. Your code is easily testable, and you handle test automation for unit tests and functional tests. All automation to support this is handled by you or other Software Engineers in the team.You follow the Software Development Life Cycle defined by Paynovate. You discuss with Product Owners handling requirements and specifications, aligning on business priorities and team goals. You manage and handle the Tooling together with the Sysadmins, so that the teams can have a reliable delivery pipeline, and are able to deliver features within a day. You also integrate various financial systems and third-party services (like payment gateways, banking APIs, etc.) to ensure seamless transaction processing.
Is this you?At Paynovate, we strive to put the right people at the right place. We want our employees to embody our values and ambitions, to help us deliver to our clients and contribute to Paynovate‚Äôs place in the market as a trusted partner of choice.You are passionate about software engineering. Your degree in Computer Science/Engineering/related field, and your proven experience in software development are your core competencies.You are attracted to varied technological environments. You are already proficient in Java/C++/Python/PHP development, but learning new programming languages is something that drives you. You are also familiar with database technologies (SQL, NoSQL) and data modeling.You are a born problem-solver and thrive in finding solutions against constrained environments. You like working in a complex sectors like financial systems, electronic payments and transaction processing for the technical challenges they pose.You find the idea of working for a regulated environment rewarding and enticing. You ideally have a good understanding of security principles and compliance regulations relevant to financial software.Autonomy, agility and excellence are your motto. You are able to propose initiatives and follow-through.English is like a second language to you. Ideally, you are at ease using either French or Dutch to communicate within the team.You are drawn to the idea of working in an international environment and love interacting with other cultures.Team cohesion is important to you. You are willing to come work from our Brussels offices at least 2/3 times per month, and ideally 3 days a week.

title: 5G Engineer
description:
We are looking for an experienced full-time R&D Engineer on 5G and beyond communications to join and work at the premises of eBOS Technologies Ltd, a fast-growing SME with 21 years of presence, headquartered in Nicosia, Cyprus. 
eBOS is one of the most innovative and leading software companies in Cyprus and in Europe, heavily investing in R&D and delivering best-of-breed innovative software solutions to enterprises worldwide. eBOS is currently ranked as the top enterprise performer in Cyprus during the past 16 years with participation in 68+ prestigious EU-funded R&D projects (including numerous 5G and 6G EU-funded R&D projects) and is currently amongst the top ten SME performers in Europe in the Horizon Europe Programme.
As a member of our R&D team, you will have the opportunity to expand your knowledge through continuous training and guidance and to complete technical research tasks for existing and new EU-funded research projects on 5G/6G of the company in collaboration with international partners.
Job Description
The successful candidate will need to work as a full time employee from the company's premises in Nicosia, Cyprus (on-site).
The candidate's duties will be to:Closely collaborate with other 5G (and beyond) research team members to manage, maintain and/or upgrade the 5G testbed of the company. Currently, the front-end of the 5G (and beyond) testbed is implemented, comprising 2 laboratory-grade, 5G base stations, a state-of-the-art USRP and a state-of-the-art 5G Data Centre. The successful candidate will be responsible for operating and re-configure the back-end (Data Centre) of the 5G testbed, comprising of the servers, VNFs, and their configuration to be orchestrated by Open-Source MANO in a controller/compute notes configuration as a Software Defined Network. Closely work with the R&D Project Managers to successfully implement the requirements and obligations stemming from our participation in 5G/6G R&D&I EU-funded projects. Represent the company in 5G/6G related R&D/R&I projects, consortia, meetings, trainings, workshops, events, conferences, etc. Contribute to the writing of project deliverables and reports. Additionally, the successful candidate will work on experimental tasks of existing, as well as new, research projects relevant to the 5G testbed. Interact with executive-level staff and project management office staff. Ability to perform in multicultural environments (sometimes under pressure), deliver results, meet deadlines, and work with minimum supervision. Meet KPI targets.
Qualifications & Experience
¬∑ University degree, Bachelor‚Äôs degree and/or Masters of Science, and/or Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) in ICT and/or communications engineering related subject, preferably in Telecommunications Engineering with a focus on 5G and beyond mobile communication technologies.¬∑ Minimum of 2 years of demonstrated proficiency in configuring, managing and operating Software Defined Networks in Mobile Core Networks, and in particular, VNFs, Open-Source MANO, 5G Testbeds, 5G Core, 5G RAN.¬∑ Excellent written, verbal, and presentation communication skills in English language.¬∑ Excellent knowledge of MS Office applications, including MS Office, MS Word, MS Excel and MS PowerPoint.¬∑ Excellent organisational and time management skills, including excellent attention to detail and multitasking skills.¬∑ Strong analytical abilities with research analyses and evaluations.¬∑ Technical problem-solving with superb planning and coordination skills.¬∑ Must be a national or have a permanent resident-ship from any of the 27 EU member states
Benefits
¬∑ Attractive annual gross remuneration ranging from ‚Ç¨27.000-‚Ç¨42.000 depending on qualifications and experience.¬∑ Ability to join the company‚Äôs Provident Fund and Medical Insurance plan after completing the first 6 months of probation period.¬∑ Flexible working hours¬∑ Bonus Loyalty Scheme¬∑ A great opportunity to enhance your skills and qualifications by working with other highly talented and experienced professionals.¬∑ Opportunity to work with renowned international organisations and institutions within Europe and beyond.
If you are an enthusiastic professional with the above skills, qualifications, and experience, and you are strongly interested in this position, please send your detailed CV to hrmanager@ebos.com.cy with the title ‚ÄúApplication for the position of R&D Engineer on 5G and Beyond communications‚Äù in the subject.

description:
Hey there, future Data Engineer at Enlitia! üåü Ready to revolutionize renewable energy data? Join us in challenging the status quo. As a Data Engineer, you'll sync and harmonize global wind and solar data, forming the backbone for machine learning, process optimization, and operational excellence. You'll design and develop data engineering pipelines using the best tools to ensure data availability and consistency. Collaborate with cross-functional teams and communicate results effectively. If you're organized, motivated, and passionate about sustainability, we'd love to hear from you!
Key Responsibilities Data Integration: Integrate new data sources, ensuring data consistency, reliability, and efficiency‚Äîlike making sure all your ducks (or bytes) are in a row.Database Management: Develop and optimize databases and data warehouses for top performance and reliability‚Äîbecause nobody likes a sluggish database. üöÄETL Processes: Create and manage ETL processes to move and transform data effectively‚Äîconsider yourself the ultimate data mixologist. üçπData Quality: Implement robust data quality checks to ensure data integrity throughout its lifecycle‚Äîkeeping those data gremlins at bay.Performance Tuning: Optimize data systems and pipelines for peak performance and scalability‚Äîbecause who doesn‚Äôt want their data to run like a well-oiled machine?Documentation: Document data processes, architectures, and pipelines comprehensively‚Äîso future you doesn‚Äôt have to play detective.Compliance: Ensure all data practices comply with relevant privacy and security regulations‚Äîkeeping everything above board and out of trouble.Collaboration: Work closely with data scientists, analysts, and stakeholders to understand data requirements and deliver effective solutions‚Äîbe the data whisperer everyone loves. üí¨
Requirements Hold a BSc, MSc, or PhD in Computer Science, Electronic Engineering, or Systems Engineering‚Äîbecause we like our Data Engineers powered up. üéì3+ years of experience in data engineering or a related field. Show us your analytical battle scars (metaphorical, of course).Proven experience with data pipelines design and orchestration, ideally with time-series data. Your data prowess speaks for itself. üìàProficiency in programming languages, mainly Python and SQL. Experience with OOP, Unix, and Git is essential. You're a coding ninja with these tools. ü•∑Experience specifically with MySQL, PostgreSQL, and TimescaleDB. These databases should be your playground.Experience managing and manipulating relational databases. Knowledge of non-relational databases is a plus.Basic knowledge of Docker is expected, as having some hands-on experience with it would be beneficial, although it's not a strict requirement.Experience with APIs is an additional requirement, reflecting the need for modern data engineering practices.Strong knowledge of ETL processes and data warehousing. You're the architect of our data world.Understanding of big data frameworks and tools is a plus. Big data challenges are your playground.Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. No puzzle is too complex for you. üß©Strong communication and presentation abilities. You turn complex data into compelling stories.Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. Collaboration is your middle name (literally). ü§ùAttention to detail and a commitment to data quality. You ensure our data is always top-notch.
Nice to have:DBT, Go, Unix/Bash. If you have experience in these areas, it's a significant plus!
Benefits and More Extra vacation days, everyone deserves some time to recharge.Healthcare insurance, because health is wealth.Meal tickets, we know debugging builds an appetite.Office options in Lisbon and Porto, because great work deserves a great location.Learning allowance, knowledge is power.
About us At Enlitia, we're not just another startup; we're crafting the future of renewable energy with our top-notch algorithms and boundless enthusiasm. Join us in driving innovation and making sustainability more than just a buzzword.
Ready to enlighten the future? Join us at Enlitia where tech meets sustainability, and every line of code makes a difference. Apply now and let's create a future we can all be proud of.

title: Software developer
description:
At Billogram, we aim to be the good guys of billing. We profit when our clients' customers are happy and make timely payments, rather than benefiting from missed payments and the subsequent debt collection. We believe that treating people well is a sound business strategy. That's why our invoicing and payments platform is engineered to eliminate friction and add value for both our clients and their customers, thereby enhancing their relationship.
We're on a mission to become a leader in the European consumer billing market, and we‚Äôre looking for a talented Software Developer to help us get there.
About the RoleAs a Software Developer at Billogram, you‚Äôll be an essential part of our product development team. You‚Äôll work on exciting projects that will push your skills and help you grow in your career. This is a great opportunity for developers who want to deepen their expertise while contributing to a cutting-edge product.
What You‚Äôll DoSupport International Expansion: Work with our team to standardize and scale our platform, making sure it‚Äôs ready for new markets across Europe.Manage Technical Debt: Help us refine our system to handle larger clients and higher transaction volumes, ensuring it‚Äôs built to last.Contribute to Product Development: Dive into coding, requirement analysis, testing, and ongoing support to help make our platform successful.Collaborate and Learn: Work closely with senior developers, learning from their experience while bringing your own fresh ideas to the table.
What We‚Äôre Looking ForWe‚Äôre looking for a proactive developer with a solid background in software development and a willingness to tackle new challenges. You should enjoy working in a team and be eager to learn new technologies.
Key QualificationsAt least 4 years of experience in software development, with strong skills in Python.A good understanding of PHP and a willingness to learn other programming languages.Experience working in a product-focused environment with a collaborative approach.
Bonus SkillsExperience in both B2B and B2C environments.Familiarity with international expansion and scaling platforms.
What We OfferBillogram provides a digital billing and payments platform, revolutionizing a forgotten part of the payments industry: the recurring invoice. Using smart technology, we help companies automate the whole payments process, leading to lower costs, increased profitability, and higher customer satisfaction. We want both sender and recipient to have the best experience possible. But since their interests don‚Äôt always align, it‚Äôs up to us to come up with smart solutions to satisfy both parties.
At Billogram, we promise you an exciting journey as we break into new markets and grow at a rapid pace. You will have the freedom and opportunity to develop alongside great colleagues at our office, right in the center of Stockholm. We also offer flexible working hours, exciting challenges, and a whole lot of laughs.
We provide equal opportunities and strive for an inclusive and diverse environment. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to gender, transgender identity or expression, ethnicity, religion or other beliefs, disability, sexual orientation, or age.
Welcome to the world of Billogram!

description:
About RIOInnovative start-up culture in a large corporation is not possible? It is! With RIO, a member of the TRATON GROUP, a new and innovative brand has positioned itself on the logistics market. RIO is developing a cloud-based platform where customers can easily and flexibly book digital services for their fleets. RIO is giving global freight transport a new face and a new order. We are a motivated team that works according to agile principles - RIO is colorful, different, dynamic. Does that appeal to you? Then you've come to the right place.
Your tasksStep into the realm of modern microservice architecture, taking ownership of changes and optimizations using the latest engineering practices.Join forces with a team of brilliant minds, collaborating in pairs to explore new solution approaches and conquer coding challenges together.Embrace the role of a mentor and leader, supporting and developing your fellow teammates, and witnessing their growth firsthand.Experience the thrill of working with a diverse technology stack that goes beyond Java and JavaScript, expanding your skills and knowledge.Fuel your curiosity and stay ahead of the curve by testing new technologies, while receiving support and resources to further your education.Enjoy the dynamic synergy of a multidisciplinary team, collaborating with designers, analysts, stakeholders, and product owners to create exceptional software solutions.Take pride in your work as you support your creations in production, ensuring their smooth operation through vigilant monitoring and proactive alerting.
Your skillsYou have professional experience in software engineering and prefer Java, JavaScript/TypeScript or Kotlin as programming languages.Experience with relevant frameworks such as Spring Boot and React is highly desired. We appreciate your familiarity with other frameworks as well.Your expertise in microservices and cloud services, especially AWS and PaaS, will be invaluable to our team.Familiarity with continuous integration and continuous delivery practices is a big plus.We are committed to an agile work environment and value individuals who thrive in such settings.Your preference for Test-Driven Development (TDD) and clean code principles aligns perfectly with our development approach.Fluency in English is a requirement.
What do we offer you?Job Safety: We are embedded in the Bavarian IG Metall tariff contract.Flexible work location: With our RIOFlex model, it is possible to work up to 90% from home or even pursue your job for some time from abroad in the EU. Since team cohesion is very important to us, we prefer onboarding and events in onsite mode and want teams to meet face-to-face 2 days per month.Flexible working hours: Work-life balance and work-life balance are not just fancy buzzwords for us, but a central part of our terms and conditions - that's why you can schedule your work independently in trust working hours.Company pension plan: Get the opportunity to invest in your future with our employer-financed company pension plan!34 days of vacation: In standard mode, you have 34 vacation days per year at your disposal - depending on your contractual arrangements, you even have the option of up to 10 vacation days on top!International Team: We love and live diversity - and are proud to continuously increase the diversity of perspectives within the company. English as the company language is of course a matter of course here.Continuing education: Your personal and professional development is close to our heart - here we encourage and challenge you with an annual training budget and individually bookable language courses. Additionally, you will receive a license for LinkedIn Learning from day 1!Team events: Look forward to regular team events (e.g. Wei√üwurst breakfast, barbecue) on our panoramic roof terrace in the Parkstadt Schwabing!Free choice of hardware: Decide for yourself whether you prefer to work with Windows or macOS - we will take care of the hardware of your choice.Corporate Benefits: Benefit from our company-wide Corporate Benefits Program, which provides you with attractive offers from renowned providers in the areas of technology, travel, fashion, living and much more."State-of-the-art" office concept: We enable collaborative work through various room settings, workshop areas and our modern kitchen (with Visacrem coffee machine ;-)). For the best possible work mode, each table is also height-adjustable and equipped with a curved monitor.

title: Software Developer
description:
Are you ready to learn fast and have a real impact on the company?Join Odoo, a growing software company with an open source product, a huge global community, as well as a fun and exciting work environment.
A WIDE RANGE OF INTERESTING PROJECTS:
We develop open source apps to help millions of employees save time in their day-to-day job.Our projects include:
--> Business Apps: from point of Sales, to logistics and accounting, we have plenty of projects around business apps (improvement, creation of new features,...)--> Frontend UI: Odoo Spreadsheet (an open source Google Spreadsheet alternative), a react/vue style JS framework (the fastest VDOM ever developed).
--> Python Framework: It's all about perf and optimizations. (ORM based on PostgreSQL)
--> Mobile: All Odoo apps run on iOS and Android hybrid mobile apps.
--> Website / Builder: An open source website builder & eCommerce, to help entrepreneurs launch their website by themselves, without technical hassle.
--> API / Connectors: Integrate Odoo with payment processors, carriers, or other services.
--> Security: from product security (code reviews, security patches) to system administration issues (pentesting, best practices, etc.).
After 3 weeks of initial training (both functional & technical), we'll present you teams looking for new members and you'll choose the one you prefer.

RESPONSIBILITIES:Develop Quality AppsCoach small distributed dev teamsBe responsible of what you developProduce clean code

MUST HAVE:Several programming languagesObject-oriented programming languagePassion for developmentQuick & Autonomous learnerRead & Written English
WHAT'S GREAT IN THE JOB:Great team of very smart people, in a friendly and open culture.Large apps scope - Diversity in the job, you'll never get bored.No customer deadlines - Time to focus on quality, refactoring and testingNo solution architect, no business analysts, no Gantt chart, no boring manager... just great developments.Real responsibilities and challenges in a fast evolving company.Friendly working environment located in a renovated farm in the countryside.An attractive and flexible package: car, fuel card, up to 35 days off per year, meal vouchers (8‚Ç¨/day), eco-cheques (250‚Ç¨/year), hospital insurance, representation fees to cover all your expenses, and much more!A Chef cooking delicious meals every day at the officeCDI full time (38h/week) with homeworking 2 days/week and flexible hours

title: Odoo / Python Developer
description:
About us Hello!We are Camptocamp, a service company founded in 2001 and one of the leading companies in Europe in the development and integration of Open Source Software (OSS). We are based in Germany, Switzerland and France.We have great know-how in Enterprise Resource Planning Software (Odoo), IT Management Systems and Geographic Information Systems (GIS).For our growing offices in Munich and Berlin, our Business Solutions team is looking for an Odoo / Python Developer (m/f/d).
The Business Solutions team is composed of business experts in the main functional areas as well as competent developers who are involved in the community. We are structured in self-organized, goal-oriented teams. Our motto is "Excellence, together": we aim to work in synergy with our customers, in a spirit of collaboration and quality.
Our ERP is called Odoo. Since 2006, Camptocamp is the first official "Gold" Odoo partner and is strongly involved in the Odoo community, especially through the Odoo Community Association (OCA) of which Camptocamp is a founding and very active member.
Your day as an Odoo / Python Developer
You will participate in the implementation and support of its project portfolio. You will work closely with consultants, architects and other developers in the team to advance our clients' ERP.Using our tools (GitHub, Docker, Travis, Argo CD, Kubernetes) you will ensure the regular testing and delivery of new features. Our operating system is Linux (Ubuntu/Pop!_OS).You study and understand the functional needs of customers in the implementation of their Odoo solution.You code new Odoo modules or contribute to existing ones, mainly in Python, HTML/XML and JavaScript where appropriate.You write quality code while respecting the functional requirements as well as the budget and deadlines.You write automatic unit and functional tests to ensure good project coverage and smooth development.You maintain the existing code base and take care to limit technical debt.You deploy applications on our hosting platform.You assist the team in providing support to our customers.You get involved in the Odoo and OCA solution and community.You participate in the evolution of our tools and hosting platform.Every day, you'll have the opportunity to learn something new, contribute to meaningful projects and have a good time with your colleagues.
Your profileAbove all, you are curious, pragmatic, solution-oriented and you want to write quality code and contribute to the success of our clients. Ideally, you are familiar with writing automated tests and contributing to open source projects.Your essential skills for success in this roleBachelor or Master degree in Computer Science or equivalent.At least 2 years experience in Odoo development.You program in Python.You have good knowledge of SQL (PostgreSQL).You are motivated, detail-oriented and responsible.You are autonomous and work under limited supervision and in a fast-paced team/environment.You communicate proactively and are comfortable with both oral and written communication.You are open to the idea of working in virtual teams spread over several offices and countries.You speak English.You have a valid work permit for Germany.
The icing on the cakeIf you are comfortable with these things, that's a plus:You are comfortable with front-end development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).You have experience with other ERP systems.You are familiar with common profiling and debugging tools and techniques.You are used to working on the Linux system.You have experience with Docker and Kubernetes.You speak German.
We offer youAt Camptocamp, work is like nowhere else. You will be part of a young, dynamic and fast-growing company.A motivating, modern and constantly evolving work environment.A culture of openness, which encourages individual initiative.Close-knit, dynamic teams where people play a central role.Innovative and formative projects.Competitive working conditions.Flexible working hours.Free language lessons (also possible during working hours).Legendary joint events - we celebrate our successes!
Start date: Immediately or by arrangement.Location: Munich or Berlin with the possibility of working from home part of the time.Work rate: We are flexible and you choose between 80% and 100%.

title: Backend Engineer (Python)
description:
We‚Äôre Bringg! A delivery management leader, serving 800+ customers globally. Leading enterprise retailers and brands use Bringg to grow their delivery capacity, reduce costs, and improve customer experiences. Every year, we process over 200 million orders through our smart, automated omnichannel platform experience. We‚Äôre hiring a Backend Engineer at the Bringg Czechia site to join our scaling R&D organization. 
What is the value of the role? We're seeking a Talented Backend Python Engineer to help us scale and take our product to the next level. The next Bringgster should be passionate about learning new things and working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Our R&D Bringgsters are facing the challenges of working on a real-time high-scale production system with enterprise clients relying on it while solving complex technical problems and business use cases.
What you are expected to deliver (Responsibilities);Write scalable, reliable, and high-performance codeEnsure high coverage of unit and functional testing.Implement pure CI/CD flows, from local development to production.Outside-the-box architectural solutionsCollaborate with R&D team members across Kyiv, Lviv, Tel Aviv, Chicago, and the UK.Engage with product managers, support staff, and other stakeholders within the company. 
What we expect you to Bringg (Requirements);3+ years of experience in Python server-side development.Strong understanding of design patterns and architectural principles.Proficient with SQL (Postgres) & NoSQL databases (Redis).Solid experience with asynchronous execution models.Proven ability in integrating RESTful APIs.
Nice to have;Familiarity with client-side development (VUE.js is preferred)Experience integrating SOAP APIs and working with EDIExperience with DevOps (Heroku + GCP)
What we offer you?Ability to work both with the existing mature product and new components from scratchPaid vacation with additional holidays to the traditional onesBroad possibilities to learn new technologies evolve as an engineer and managerZero bureaucracyA meetingless atmosphereAbility share your knowledge across the team and outsideTop-notch equipment and working conditions to make work comfortableCozy and comfortable hybrid office once it will be safeCorporate events and celebrations, we love to have fun :)

title: Associate Python Engineer
description:
Ebury is a hyper-growth FinTech firm, named in 2021 as one of the top 15 European Fintechs to work for by AltFi. We offer a range of products including FX risk management, trade finance, currency accounts, international payments and API integration.

Associate Python Engineer 

Madrid Office - Hybrid: 4 days in the office, 1 day working from home

The Role

Our Engineering teams at Ebury in Madrid is seeking a recent high-school or university graduate to join the team as an Associate Engineer. As part of our diverse team spread across South America and Europe, the successful candidate will learn on the fly and be immersed in a supportive environment aimed at fostering the skills necessary for a prosperous career in FinTech. The candidate will grow while contributing to the development and optimisation of our multi-currency accounting system and exchange of foreign currencies.

No prior work experience is required; we're looking for drive, curiosity, and a genuine interest in technology and financial services.

Responsibilities

Contribute to the design and development of our transformative FX platform under the guidance of experienced mentors.Help in troubleshooting and resolving issues within our systems, gaining valuable hands-on experience with real-world applications.Participate in coding, testing, and deploying software updates to improve functionality and user experience.Learn best practices in software development, including code reviews, continuous integration, and deployment workflows.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand user needs and partake in the creation of innovative financial products. 

Requirements

Graduate or final year student with a strong interest in starting a career in software development and financial technologies.Basic understanding of programming concepts, preferably in Python or other object-oriented languages.Excellent problem-solving abilities and a desire to work on challenging projects that require critical thinking.Eagerness to learn new technologies and a readiness to embrace the dynamic environment of a hyper-growth company.Since you will work side by side with colleagues from different countries, you will be able to communicate clearly and concisely your ideas in English, both written and spoken. 

About Us

Ebury is a FinTech success story, positioned among the fastest-growing international companies in its sector.

Founded in 2009, we are headquartered in London and have more than 1700 staff with a presence in more than 25 countries worldwide. Cultural diversity is part of what makes Ebury a special place to be. From Sao Paulo to Dubai, Bucharest to Toronto, we enjoy sharing team experiences and celebrating success across the Ebury family.

Hard work pays off: in 2019, Ebury received a ¬£350 million investment from Banco Santander and has won internationally recognised awards including Financial Times: 1000 Europe's Fastest-Growing Companies.

None of this would have been possible without our proudest achievement: our great people. Enthusiastic, innovative and collaborative teams, always ready to disrupt and revolutionise the fast-paced FinTech sector.

We believe in inclusion. We stand against discrimination in all forms and have no tolerance for the intolerance of differences that makes us a modern and successful organisation. At Ebury, you can be whoever you want to be and still feel a sense of belonging no matter your story because we want you and your uniqueness to help write our future.

Please submit your application on the careers website directly, uploading your CV / resume in English.

title: AI Developer
description:
Euronext Euronext is the leading pan-European market infrastructure, shaping capital markets for future generations. Its mission is to connect European economies to global capital markets, to accelerate innovation and sustainable growth. Euronext is located in 18 countries across Europe, US and Asia, with regulated exchanges in Belgium, France, Ireland, Italy, the Netherlands, Norway and Portugal. The group has expanded organically and externally, with a revenue growing from ‚Ç¨458 million in 2014 to ‚Ç¨1.5 billion in 2022, with 2,200 employees and 55 nationalities. With close to 1,900 listed issuers and around ‚Ç¨6.5 trillion in market capitalisation as of end June 2023, it has an unmatched blue-chip franchise and a strong diverse domestic and international client base, as well as a large Tech companies community, Euronext Tech Leaders. Euronext closely accompanies corporates thanks to its pre-IPO programmes and a full suite of innovative corporate services. Euronext operates regulated and transparent equity and derivatives markets, one of Europe's leading electronic fixed income trading markets and is the largest center for debt and funds listings in the world. Its total product offering includes Equities, FX, Exchange Traded Funds, Warrants & Certificates, Bonds, Power, Derivatives, Commodities, Advanced Data Services and Indices. The Group provides a European multi-asset clearing house through Euronext Clearing, and custody and settlement services through Euronext Securities central securities depositories in Denmark, Italy, Norway and Portugal. Euronext also leverages its expertise in running markets by providing technology, corporate and data services to third parties. Euronext is engaged in an ambitious ESG policy, translated into its "Fit for 1.5¬∞" commitment to net zero, supported by SBTI approved targets. Euronext Corporate Services Euronext Corporate Services, is at the core of Euronext's Growth for Impact 2024 strategy. It has delivered ‚Ç¨46m of revenue in 2023, growing +12% vs 2022, being one of the most important growth engine of the Group. Euronext Corporate Services already serves more than 4,500+ clients including over 1000 listed companies, private companies, advisors and public organisations. Clients are located across all Euronext markets (Belgium, France, Italy, Ireland, Netherlands, Norway Portugal,) but also beyond (e.g. UK, Germany, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Spain). The team is composed of over 170 professionals across Europe. They help listed companies make the most effective use of capital markets, and support private and public organisations run more efficiently.Euronext Corporate Services already serves more than 4,500+ clients including over 1000 listed companies, private companies, advisors and public organisations. Clients are located across all Euronext markets (Belgium, France, Italy, Ireland, Netherlands, Norway Portugal,) but also beyond (e.g. UK, Germany, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Spain). This unique and comprehensive value proposition is articulated around three main pillars: * Governance services: To public and private organizations we provide our board portal solution "iBabs" to help secure, organize and run board meetings more efficiently (save time preparing agendas and board packs, collaborate easily with annotations, voting, meeting summaries).Our advanced video technology allows you to easily broadcast your meetings, from webinars, townhalls and studio events, we provide the right solution * Investor relations and communication services: we help our clients to increase their visibility, engagement and international coverage with shareholders, investors and all stakeholders with leading digital communications and streaming solutions. We also provide flexible and customized market data components for Investor Relations websites of listed companies. Our IR.Manager tool provides a complete and intuitive IR management and targeting platform for corporate IR teams to professionalize the workflow and engagement. Our advisory team provides high-touch advisory, ESG advisory, market intelligence and decision making analytics for listed companies willing to be more active on capital markets. * Compliance services : our ComplyLog products helps companies simplify their EU regulatory duties, speed up workflows and ensure compliance by automating the management of inside information and insider lists for both issuers and their professional advisors ensuring compliance with the European Market Abuse Regulation (MAR).  Euronext Corporate Services is a fully integrated division of Euronext, including all the resources to pursue its business activities: Revenue, Growth Marketing, Product, Technology & Operations, Client Services and Transformation. It also relies on Euronext support functions to accompany its growth. Role and Key AccountabilitiesCreating proofs of concept (POC) and working on innovative R&D projects.Design, develop, and deploy AI/ML solutions with a focus on NLP, LLM, audio, and video processing using AI frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.Fine-tune and optimize pre-trained models for specific use cases and applications.Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Tech Leads, software engineer(s) and product managers to understand business requirements and translate them into high-quality AI solutions.Conduct regular performance evaluations, identify bottlenecks, and implement optimization strategies to enhance model efficiency and accuracy.Conduct experiments and research to stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI/ML.Analyze and interpret complex data sets to derive actionable insights.Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation for models and algorithms.Build and maintain production ready ML pipelines Knowledge, Personality, Skills and Experience Required Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.Minimum 3 years of experience in Data Science and Machine Learning.In-depth knowledge of machine learning, deep learning, and generative AI techniques.Knowledge and experience of development and implementing Generative AI modelsProficiency in programming languages such as Python, and frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch or Keras.Experience with natural language processing (NLP) techniques and tools, such as SpaCy, NLTK, or Hugging Face.Strong understanding of frameworks such as BERT, GPT, or Transformer models.Hands-on experience in fine-tuning and optimising pre-trained models.Familiar with cloud-based platforms and services, such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.Knowledge of trusted AI practices, ensuring fairness, transparency, and accountability in AI models and systems.Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions.Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with stakeholders at various levels, Fluency in English.Track record of driving innovation and staying updated with the latest AI research and advancements. Euronext ValuesUnity We respect and value the people we work withWe are unified through a common purposeWe embrace diversity and strive for inclusion Integrity We value transparency, communicate honestly and share information openlyWe act with integrity in everything we doWe don't hide our mistakes, and we learn from them Agility We act with a sense of urgency and decisivenessWe are adaptable, responsive and embrace changeWe take smart risks Energy We are positively driven to make a difference and challenge the status quoWe focus on and encourage personal leadershipWe motivate each other with our ambition Accountability We deliver maximum value to our customers and stakeholdersWe take ownership and are accountable for the outcomeWe reward and celebrate performance We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate against individuals on the basis of race, gender, age, citizenship, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, or any other legally protected factor. We value the unique talents of all our people, who come from diverse backgrounds with different personal experiences and points of view and we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect.

title: ML Engineer
description:
We are offering an ML Engineer position, to build the global contextual advertising leader.
WHO WE ARESeedtag is the leading Contextual Advertising Platform. Our proprietary, machine learning-based technology provides a human-like understanding of the content on the web, the highest level of brand safety in the industry and unmatched cookieless targeting capabilities.We engage with the market on both demand and supply sides to create, activate and launch high-quality advertising campaigns at scale. We are committed to creating a more beautiful, respectful and engaging way to do advertising.
KEY FIGURES2014 ¬∑ Founded by two ex-Googlers2018 ¬∑ 16M total turnover & Internationalization & Getting growth2021 ¬∑ Capital raise of 40M‚Ç¨ & +12 countries & +300 Seedtaggers2022 ¬∑ Funding round of 250M‚Ç¨ + expansion into the U.S. market + 400 Seedtaggers2024 ¬∑ Expansion into 18 countries + 600 Seedtaggers
YOUR CHALLENGEThe AdExchange is the space where supply opportunities (ad slots) are matched to advertising demand items (ads). Just like the former trading pits in the stock market, opportunities to sell and buy are constantly created and resolved.To make the most of this flow of monetization opportunities, we develop, train and deploy different Machine Learning models. At our AdExhange, you will find a myriad of use cases, each requiring different mathematical and infrastructure solutions. Our approach is strongly product-oriented, with a firm mathematical basis and proficient software development practices.You will work close to the production environment and hand-to-hand with the team‚Äôs Data Scientists, MLOps and Data engineers, getting immediate feedback on the response of your solution. From your head to the cluster, you will have a barrier-free highway and a proactive team around you to support your work and ideas.This is a high-impact project that will shape the future of SeedtagYou will work on identifying, exploring, and making sense of data sourcesYou will partner closely with the Data component of our squad, to enhance the delivery of the intelligence into the AdExchangeYou will develop machine learning solutions to solve business problems: anomaly detection, price optimization, etc.You will develop and deploy production-oriented data software
YOU WILL SUCCEED IN THIS ROLE IFYou have 2-4 years of solid experience in data science and machine learningYou (preferentially) have a degree in computer science, engineering, statistics, mathematics, physics or another degree with a strong quantitative component.You understand the theoretical functioning of the main algorithms in ML and you have experience applying these to real problemsYou have ample experience with one or more of these machine learning tools: Scikit-learn, Tensorflow, PyTorch, etc.You have a strong understanding of the technical and business requirements of the projects you work on, and you can think strategically to ensure that your work aligns with the goals of the company.You are energized by tackling complex technical problems and figuring out creative solutions.You are committed to staying up-to-date with the latest developments in back-end engineering and are always looking for ways to improve your skills and knowledge.You are comfortable working collaboratively with others, and you are able to effectively communicate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.You are comfortable working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment, and you are able to adjust to changing priorities and requirements.
SEEDTAG PERKSKey moment to join Seedtag in terms of growth and opportunitiesHigh-performance tier salary bands excellent compensationOne Seedtag: Work for a month from any of our open offices with travel and stay paid if you‚Äôre a top performer (think of Brazil, Mexico...)Real flexible schedule to balance work and personal lifeA harassment-free, supportive and safe environment to ensure the healthiest and friendliest professional experience fostering diversity at all levelsOptional company-paid English, French and/or Spanish coursesAccess to learning opportunities (learning & development budget) and Odilo online academy, where you can learn as much as you wantWe love what we do, but we also love having fun. We have many team activities you can join and enjoy with your colleagues! A Yearly offsite with all the company, team offsites, and Holiday events‚Ä¶
BENEFITS OF WORKING AT SEEDTAGGrowth: International, highly demanding work environment in one of the fastest growing AdTech companies in Europe. We reject "that‚Äôs the way it‚Äôs always been done". In Seedtag you can find an energetic, fresh workplace, multicultural work environment where our members are from different countries in Europe, LATAM, the US and so many more!Impact: The chance to have a direct impact, here you don't work for the sake of working, we all have an impact on Seedtag in our own way, rowing in the same directionDiversity of methodology and people: Seedtag DNA is unique and highly appreciated by very different types of Seedtagers. We embrace diversity and encourage everyone to seek the best version of themselves and to show who they really are. With a totally flexible methodologyFlexibility: At Seedtag, we trust you, you can work from home, the beach or the office in our hybrid mode 
Are you ready to join the Seedtag adventure? Then send us your CV!

title: Back End Developer
description:
Who are we?
Santander Auto Software is looking for a Back End Engineer.Santander Auto Software, a greenfield program where we are building a brand-new, state of the art global software platform and product suite that will be rolled out in 13 countries.
The business is 100% tech focused, comprised of skilled cross-border software builders, and with a leadership team made up of esteemed individuals with accomplished backgrounds in global tech players.
If you are looking for an opportunity to build creative technology solutions that positively impact hundreds of thousands of international customers, and relish large ownership and diverse technologies, join our team today!
Santander is proud of being an organization where there are equal opportunities regardless of gender identity, culture and disability. Our mission is to contribute to help more people and business prosper.
WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING
We are looking for skilled back end focused software engineers with experience working with Java (or Kotlin) and Spring Boot, Kubernetes and AWS, who have experience working in a software on demand production environment. You will build Cloud-native, AWS-based, greenfield software and will have time and support to invent solutions to a wide variety of user, business, and technical challenges. We have no cut-and-paste roles and neither will your software be of the cut-and-paste (or integrate and configure) variety. We operate a 'build it and own it' culture, and so you will have a DevOps and individual contributor mindset
These will be key hires for back-end building squads and help shape this area of the business for scale and be a key member of a fast-growing global team!

Qualifications/RequirementsSoftware development in Java (Spring Boot) or Kotlin - design, build, and deployProduction deployment experience working with AWSExperience with automated build and test systems for CI/CD (using Docker, Jenkins, etc)Experienced in true Agile and its engineering practices with a true DevOps mindsetBack-end Development with Java or KotlinFluent in EnglishAble to deal with ambiguity and change.A self-starter who's able to work independently where necessary, without waiting for others. A strong sense of ownership is key to the way we work.Strong communication skills.

LOCATIONS
SAS has implemented a working from home model. This means that your workplace is your home residence as aligned to your contract. We can hire in Spain, Portugal or the Netherlands.

title: Back End Developer
description:
As we continue to experience significant growth, we are looking for a Backend Developer to join one of our engineering teams in Sweden. This team is dedicated to establishing our platform in the dynamic Finnish market. In this role, you'll have the opportunity to work on projects utilizing technologies like PHP and Angular.
